extendedInfo.description: ** IF YOU ENJOY THIS APP PLEASE CHECK OUT MY NEWLY RELEASED CONVERT EVERYTHING APP  **** AppGarden for Android Rolls Together Dozens Of Useful Tools into One App - Lifehacker.com **** AppGarden Brings a Slew of Useful Utilities - XDA developers **** App Garden: A Swiss Army Knife for Your Phone - Appstorm **A collection of useful utilities in one simple easy to use app. Several apps also have several sources to choose from. Here is a small sample of what's available and more coming soon. Also, I'd like to extend a big thank you to the great people over at stands4 for their great support and API access.AbbreviationsConversions: acceleration, area, bandwidth/data type, circular measure, currency, decimal to roman numeral, energy, flow rate, fuel consumption, length/distance, liquid volume, power, pressure, sound, time, temperature, wavelength to RGB, weight/massDays untilArea code lookupBi-gram phrasesAirport codesCountdown timerDictionary w/ 3 sourcesExample word usageFilm related: Film information such as cast, cost etc, Rotten tomatoes reviewsDiscount calculatorMortgage calculatorSales tax calculatorStandard calculatorReminders / AlarmsQR code scannerTip calculatorBasal metabolic rateBody fatBody Mass Index (BMI)Daily caloric intakeMax heart rateOne rep maxTarget heart rateWaist to hip ratioWater intakeFitness relatedHoliday listings from 6 countriesMappingMusic related: Album art, artist information, artist image, similar artists, events via gps, track/song informationOhm's LawPhrasesPastebinPostal code lookupPronunciationsQuestion and answerRandom numberRandom passwordRandom quoteSlangSpelling suggestionsStock quoteStopwatchSyllablesSynonymsSystem statsTimezone information using latitude/longitude or using current GPS positionThesaurus w/ 3 sourcesUrban dictionaryBit.ly URL shortenerWeather using GPS, zipcode, city, alertsWhois lookupWikipediaStatusbar notesAudio recorderWord etymology			    Word of the dayRhyming words w/ 2 sources.Country informationCurrent elevationNeighborhood information* Text Utilities- Escape/Unescape URL's, URI's, & XML- Encode/decode Base64- Adjust cases to/from UPPERCASE, lowercase, sWITCH cASE, Title Case, First letter of sentence- Trim leading and trailing spaces- Convert String to hex and vice versa- Search and replace feature- Text statistics which include word count, line numbers, character count, space count, word occurences including percentages.- Import plain text files via SD or internal memory- Export changes as plain text files- Lexical density- Display word count based on word length- Display unique word count- Average word length- Characters without spaces- Convert binary to string and vice versa* File compare - import/compare text files and hilight differences- Percent calculators* gross margin* percent calculator* percent change* percent increase/decrease* percentage- Dice roller* Wallpapers / backgrounds* On this day- Audio frequencies- Integer set generator- List randomizer- Names- Playing card shuffler- Sequence generator- Recipe of the day- Random composite numbers- Random prime numbers- Random odd numbers- Random even numbers- Random file generator- Raw Random Bytes

reviews.title: OK so far
reviews.comment: Suggestions:  zip code finder...pls add field for town too for ppl who know the town but need the towns zip code!   Currently we can only add a zip code to get towns name....
reviews.author: Kelli Hillman

reviews.title: A MUST have!
reviews.comment: Appgarden turns your phone into a swiss army knife/ batman utility belt of tools and knowledge.
reviews.author: Paul DeGraff

reviews.title: GREAT!
reviews.comment: This app is like a informational swiss army knife. Love it :-)
reviews.author: Teresa Embrey

reviews.title: Why I won\'t purchase pro
reviews.comment: App isn\'t tablet friendly in terms of font size, no ability to adjust size or zoom. I use both 10.1 and 7\' devices and it\'s really annoying. If devs ever upgrade display settings, I\'ll buy. Until then..
reviews.author: marmielo marmielo

reviews.title: Good Stuff
reviews.comment: A  very nice collection of apps.  alot of them require internet connection and are nothing more than web searches but almost have to do that to keep the size down and updates under control.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: VERY USEFUL APP
reviews.comment: Lots of fun.  Can look up almost anything.  Great app.  Weather info the best.
reviews.author: Pat Zanzi

reviews.title: Not much fun...
reviews.comment: Really, what\'s the point of this..? Most apps when you choose them come up with a \"..enter a word to search\", like the \"slang\" words and the \"urban dictionary\

reviews.title: Great Array of Apps
reviews.comment: A very nice mix of very useful apps.  You will find yourself using this all the time. Great job!
reviews.author: Richard Dezso

reviews.title: Surprisingly useful
reviews.comment: It took me a while to really get what is application does because of what it does very well. obvious improvements but I\'m Already using it more often than I thought I would.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: The best all in one app out there. It\'s for getting information.
reviews.author: jay sabra

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: very cool app havent seen anything like it thanks
reviews.author: Julio Cerna

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Very useful app with lots of features packed into one.
reviews.author: Srinivas Potta

reviews.title: Contacting server problems
reviews.comment: Stuck on contacting server when entering certain information. Also some menus don\'t display after being bulleted.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thats REALLY Impressive!!
reviews.comment: Loads of apps that Ive been downloading separately - packed all in one free app :D I esspecially the events search option :) it all fits well ;) Freaking outstanding
reviews.author: A Google User
